items.title: Why a college degree is still worthwhile—and the 3 things it can teach you that AI can’t do
items.description: College can help safeguard employees from having their jobs offshored to India or the Philippines, Carl Benedikt Frey told Fortune.

items.title: Meld raises $7 million to integrate stablecoin networks, build the ‘Visa for crypto’
items.description: The startup’s Meld network seeks to be a one-stop shop across different countries

items.title: Courts keep telling Trump that he can’t cut funding for ‘sanctuary cities,’ but now he’s going to try to cut states off, too
items.description: Trump unveiled the concept this time late in a speech Tuesday at the Detroit Economic Club, without offering specifics.

items.title: 49-year-old former CEO of camp for sick kids charged with embezzling over $50 million from Paul Newman-founded nonprofit
items.description: Christopher L. Butler, 49, of Porter Ranch, California, is expected to be arraigned Thursday in Los Angeles.

items.title: Mamdani-Hochul alliance exposes affordability rift in New York state: ‘Republicans have kids, too, you can stand’
items.description: Hochul, a centrist from Buffalo, faces challenges from both her political left and right in this year's election.
